G\u00fczelle\u015firken kalbi durdu: Her heart stopped while becoming beautiful
RIO DA JANEIRO'da ya\u015fayan iki \u00e: Raquel Santos (28), a mother of two living in RIO DE JANEIRO, consulted a plastic surgeon last Monday to erase the laughter lines around her mouth.
Y\u00fcz\u00fcne dolgu malzemesi enjekte: The heart rate and breathing of the woman quickened some time after filling material had been injected into her face.
Sonras\u0131nda kalbinin durmas\u0131 so: She then suffered a heart attack and died.
Polis, kad\u0131n\u0131n g\u00fcnl\u00fc: The police are now investigating whether the medicine she used daily, "Potenay", played any role in her death.
Ger\u00e7ek \u00f6l\u00fcm nedeni otopsi: The actual cause of death will become clear after the autopsy.
Modelin en yak\u0131n arkada\u015flar\u0: One of the closest friends of the model, Debora Azevedo, told the Brazilian press that Santos, who had two sons aged 7 and 13, was obsessed with plastic surgery.
Brezilya'n\u0131n en \u00f6nemli g\u00fc: Last December Santos took part in and finished in second place in the Muso do Brasil, one of the most important beauty contests in Brazil.
Petrol fiyatlar\u0131n\u0131n d\u00fc\u0: An investment of 400 billion dollars was shelved and most deep-sea oil exploration projects were suspended between 2014, when oil prices started to drop, and the end of last year.
Dan\u0131\u015fmanl\u0131k \u015firketi: According to research from the consulting company Wood Mackenzie, low oil prices were the cause of the suspension of the 380 billion dollar-project for oil and gas exploration/production, and the production of millions of barrels of oil was postponed in a vast area reaching from the Mexican Gulf to Africa.
Maliyet kesintilerinin en b\u00fcy\u00fc: The report showing that the biggest reason for the price drop is that oil prices have fallen from their 2014 level of 115 dollars to their lowest level in the last 12 years, losing more than 70 percent of their value in 1.5 years, includes the statement that "company budgets have dramatically shrunk".
Ham petrol fiyatlar\u0131 her ge\u00e7en: While the crude oil price continues to surprise every single day, it has recently fallen under the 30 dollar mark, which is its lowest level in the last 12 years.
\"Petrol 15 dolara d\u00fc\u015fer mi\";: In these days of heated debates about "whether the price of oil can fall below 15 dollars", or "whether oil is dirt cheap", the research published by the energy consulting firm Wood Mackenzie reveals how the sector has been affected by the falling prices.
Son olarak Temmuz'da yay\u0131nlad\u0131: Suggesting that the falling oil prices caused the suspension of 46 big energy investments worth 200 billion dollars in a report published in July, Wood Mackenzie, in new research, disclosed what the total figure was up to the end of 2015.
Buna g\u00f6re, 2015'in son alt\u0131 ay: According to this, while 22 more projects were postponed in the last six months of 2015, a total of 68 projects were suspended from 2014, when the drop in oil prices began.
Bu projelerin de\u011feri ise yakla\u015: The value of these projects is estimated at around 400 billion dollars.
D\u00fc\u015f\u00fck petrol fiyatlar\u01: In the research, it has been underlined that the low oil prices had a "brutal" effect on company plans and it has been noted that the projects most affected were deep water development projects.
Ask\u0131ya al\u0131nan projeler toplamd: The suspended projects correspond to a total reserve of 27 billion barrels of crude oil, and the daily production of 2.9 million barrels has therefore been delayed until 2025.
Ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya g\u00f6re, s\u00f6: According to the research, the final investment decision for most of the aforementioned projects was later shelved until 2017, and the first production goals are targeting the years between 2020 and 2023.
Ertelenen 68 proje aras\u0131nda, \u00f6: The report underlines that the postponed 68 projects include a potential 170 billion dollar investment that is predicted to be carried out in the next 5 years, and "most of the 170 billion dollars is comprised of deep water projects".
Bunun da sebebi \u00f6n yat\u0131r\u0131: The reason for this is the high preliminary investment costs.
\"Derin deniz harcamalar\u0131n\u0131n y: It is said that "70 percent of the deep-sea expenditure is made up in particular of oil based projects in Nigeria, Angola and the Mexican Gulf in the U.S".
Ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya g\u00f6re, en \u00: According to the research, the countries having the biggest number of suspended projects are Canada, Angola, Kazakhstan, Nigeria, Norway and the U.S.
Bu alt\u0131 \u00fclke, ertelenen s\u013: These six countries have almost 90 percent of the suspended liquid (oil) reserves.
En b\u00fcy\u00fck miktarda ertelenen ga: Mozambique, Australia, Malaysia and Indonesia account for the biggest number of suspended gas reserves with 85 percent of the total.
Buralarda \u00e7\u0131kmay\u0131 bekleye: Most of the natural gas waiting to be extracted lies in deep waters, and requires complex and expensive solutions such as building a liquefied natural gas (LNG) plant from scratch.
En tehlikeye maruz kalan \u015firketleri: It has been stated that the most endangered companies are the oil giants having successive undertakings in the Canadian oil sands and the Caspian Sea Region, and it is said that these companies are trying to adapt to the scenario of "lower for longer" oil prices.
\u00c7ok de\u011fil d\u00f6rt y\u0131l k: Just four years ago the situation was as follows: the U.S. and Europe imposed an embargo on Iran oil to stop Tehran's nuclear program; the barrel price of oil was around 110 dollars and debate centred on how Iran's oil exports would be cut without causing any sharp jump in the prices.
Bu haftaya d\u00f6nd\u00fc\u011f\u00fcm\: When we return to this week, we witness a very different scenario.
Petrol fiyatlar\u0131 2004'ten bu yana i: Oil prices have fallen below 30 dollars for the first time since 2004, and the principal cause of this was the production boom in the U.S.; and embargoes imposed on Iran being abolished.
Bu nedenle g\u00f6zler \u0130ran'\u0131n: For this reason, all the eyes are on Iran.
\u0130ran'\u0131n petrol ihracat\u0131n\: If Iran increases its oil exports, more oil will be added to the market, which is said to be already quite full.
Bu da fiyatlar\u0131n bug\u00fcn bizi \u: This may cause the price to fall below even the surprising levels of today.
Baz\u0131 analistler, \u0130ran'a pazar: Some analysts are saying that Saudi Arabia, not wanting to lose any market share to Iran, will pump more oil and Iran and S. Arabia will enter a price war.
Yapt\u0131r\u0131mlar kalkar kalkmaz, \u: Soon after the elimination of the enforcements, it is stated that the principal targets of Iran are India, being the fastest growing oil market in Asia, and its old partners in Europe.
\u0130ranl\u0131 yetkililer daha \u00f6n: Iranian officials have previously said that they aimed to increase initial exports by 500 thousand barrels a day and to add the same amount to the market after a while.
Reuters'\u0131n harita bilgilerine g\u00: According to the map data from Reuters, there are 22 very large crude carriers (VLCC) waiting off the coast of Iran, 13 of which are fully or mostly loaded.
\u0130ran, d\u00fcnyan\u0131n en b\u00fc: Iran is in the position of being the country with the fourth biggest proven oil reserves in the world.
Yapt\u0131r\u0131m istisnalar\u0131 saye: Thanks to exceptions within the embargo, Iran currently exports approximately 1 million barrels of crude oil to some countries including Turkey.
Yapt\u0131r\u0131mlardan \u00f6nce ise \: Before the embargo, Iran's daily oil export increased to 3 million barrels a day.
Destek Menkul De\u011ferler Ara\u015ft\u: A research specialist at securities company Destek Menkul Değerler, Aysun Göksu, answers the question of whether oil will fall below 20 dollars as follows: "China-centred global growth concerns increase downward pressure on commodity prices and intensifies the drop in oil prices."
D\u00fcnyan\u0131n en b\u00fcy\u00fck pe: We are seeing that losses reached 20 percent since the beginning of the year amid concerns that the demand for oil would decline in line with the economic slowdown in China, which is the biggest oil importer in the world.
Ek olarak dolar\u0131n k\u00fcresel \u00: In addition to this, we may witness oil prices below 30 dollars in the forthcoming days due to the effects of the global appreciation of the dollar and the problem of global excess supply.
32-33 dolar seviyeleri \u00fczerinde kal: As long as we do not see any permanent pricing above the 32-33 dollar-level, the upward movement of oil prices may remain limited and the downward pressure on prices may increase.
Bu noktada kritik 30 dolar seviyesi alt\: At that point, we can say that closing prices under the 30 dollar-level will play a key role in the continuation of the decline.
B\u00f6yle bir durumda alt tarafta 23.30: In this situation, it should be no surprise if it is seen that there is a loosening of the support level of 23.30-25.60 in the lower end.
Isham Sardouk: 'Melek devri bitti art\u0: Isham Sardouk: "The era of angels is now over!"
Victoria's Secret ve d\u00fcnyan\u0131n: While carrying out the duty of trend creation in WGSN, which determines the fashion trends of Victoria's Secret and the world; why did you change your course to Turkey?
Paris'te do\u011fdum, Londra'da ya\u015f: I was born in Paris, lived in London, and after that went to New York.
Orada da \u00f6nemli pozisyonlar \u00fcs: I took up key positions there.
Bu s\u0131rada, son iki y\u0131ld\u0131r: Meanwhile, I started to provide consultancy services to Koton over the last two years.
Sonra da bu co\u011frafyada ve Koton mar: After that I saw the potential in this area and the brand Koton.
D\u00fcnya \u00e7a\u011f\u0131nda bir ma: I realized that everything needed to be a worldwide chain store was there.
\u015eimdi bunu ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirme: Now I'm here to make it happen.
K\u0131sa s\u00fcrede ba\u015farabilecek: Can you achieve this in a short time?
Zaten gen\u00e7 bir marka olmas\u0131na: Even though it is a small brand, it is already sold in 50 countries.
Y\u0131lda 50 koleksiyon \u00e7\u0131kar: We launch 50 collections every year, we have 15 different sections.
Yani bir ma\u011faza zincirinin sahip ol: In other words, there is everything a chain store needs to have.
Dubai'den Moskova'ya farkl\u0131 co\u011: We can respond to the needs of the consumers in different areas from Dubai to Moscow.
\u015eimdi mart ay\u0131nda Paris'te de: Currently, we are opening a store in Paris in May, and it is the beginning of a new and exciting era...
Paris'te \u015fart m\u0131 ma\u011faza a: Is it a must to open a store in Paris?
Avrupa'n\u0131n ekonomik durumu \u015fah: It is not because the economic situation in Europe is great.
Ama baz\u0131 ma\u011fazalar\u0131 imaj: However, you open some stores for image.
Paris, Londra gibi moda ba\u015fkentleri: You have stores in fashion capitals such as Paris, London and you make money in the Middle East.
Biri markaya prestij katar, di\u011feri: One of them adds prestige to the brand and the other adds money; both of them are necessary for a brand making an effort to be global.
OK, so let's talk about the trends...
- \u00d6n\u00fcm\u00fczde \u00e7ok roman: - We have a romantic and chic season ahead of us.
U\u00e7u\u015fan \u015fifon elbiseler, y: Flying chiffon dresses, smooth tones, pinks, whites, reds.
\u00c7ok zor ve ac\u0131mas\u0131z zaman: We are experiencing harsh and brutal times; the fashion world always brings chic and heart-warming designs to the podium and tries to add a tiny bit of happiness to life in times like this.
Bizim de yapt\u0131\u011f\u0131m\u0131z: What we are doing is the same.
Bu y\u00fczden yeni sezonda \"zarafet \u: For this reason, the "era of elegance" is returning in the new season.
Victoria's Secret'taki y\u0131llar\u0131: Let's go back to your years in Victoria's Secret.
En efsane melek kimdi? -Karolina Kurkova: Who was the most legendary angel? - Karolina Kurkova.
Sadece muhte\u015fem fizi\u011finden bah: I am not talking about her gorgeous physique: She is so positive and she is such a good girl!
Ben \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131rken yan\u: While working, she sat beside me and said "Are you hungry, honey?" and gave me an apple, etc.
In a word, she was so sweet.
Sen de bilirsin neden bahsetti\u011fimi,: You also know what I am talking about, I looked into you and discovered that you have done lots of interviews with all the models of Victoria's Secret.
Karolina ne kadar g\u00fczeldi de\u011fi: Karolina is so beautiful, isn't she?
Ama Adriana Lima da g\u00fczelli\u011fiy: But Adriana Lima also impressed me with her beauty...
- Ya evet de, o ses!: - You have a point, but that voice!
\u0130nsan\u0131 bir s\u00fcre sonra ger: It stresses you after a while and you say, "Sit somewhere and look beautiful; do nothing else!"
Do\u011fru, b\u00f6yle \u015foklar ya\u0: Yes, you can experience these kinds of shocks.
Candice Swanepoel'le r\u00f6portaj yapm\: I done an interview with Candice Swanepoel.
Hayat\u0131mda g\u00f6rd\u00fc\u011f\u00: She was the most beautiful girl I've ever seen in my life but I was astonished by her empty-headedness.
- Most of them are like that.
The new angels are not like in the past...
Gisele'in d\u00f6nemini hat\u0131rl\u013: I remember the time of Gisele...
Ger\u00e7i onunla \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma: It was quite hard to work with her though.
Kulise gelir, baca gibi sigara i\u00e7er: She used to come backstage and smoke like a chimney.
It was not because she is addicted.
Kimse i\u00e7emiyor ya, bir tek o i\u00e: Nobody can smoke you see, only she can smoke!
It is just to be a "diva".
\u0130ki ay \u00f6nce yay\u0131mlanan Vi: Broadcast two months ago, the Victoria's Secret fashion parade got the lowest rating in its history.
Neden sizce?: Why do you think that is?
- Dedi\u011fim gibi, bitti art\u0131k o: - As I said, that legendary era of beautiful angels is now over.
Pardon da Gigi Hadid'i kim ne yaps\u0131: Pardon me, who needs Gigi Hadid?
Kendall Jenner, for example, she is as flat as a board...
There are no curves, there is nothing.
Kate Moss'un da k\u0131vr\u0131mlar\u013: Kate Moss is not curvy either but she became the biggest name in the fashion industry.
- Evet ama onun y\u00fcz\u00fc ne kadar: - It is true but her face was so beautiful.
Burada itiraz hakk\u0131m\u0131 kullanma: I want to use my right to object.
Ge\u00e7en y\u0131l r\u00f6portaj yapt\u: Last year, I did an interview with her; her face has gotten quite old...
- Bu kadar sigara, i\u00e7kiye, \u015fim: - Between smoking and alcohol, she naturally lost her beauty.
Ama doksanlarda o kadar g\u00fczel bir y: But she had such a beautiful face in the nineties.
Her lips were like Brigitte Bardot's.
O s\u00fcpermodel d\u00f6neminin sonuna: She represents the end of the supermodel era.
Linda Evangelista'n\u0131n, Naomi Campbe: The era of Linda Evangelista, Naomi Campbell and Christy Turlington...
Christy yan kom\u015fumdu ve her sabah m: Christy was my next door-neighbour and I saw her without makeup.
B\u00f6yle bir duru g\u00fczellik, b\u00: There cannot be such pure beauty, there cannot be such elegance.
There is no need to be involved in every campaign.
Zaten eskisi gibi '\u00fcnl\u00fc modell: Besides, there is no hunger for "famous models and celebrities" like in the past.
\u0130nsanlar kendi gibi, ger\u00e7ek y\: People want to see real faces like their own faces in the campaigns.
25 yazardan T\u00fcrkiye mektubu: A letter to Turkey from 25 authors
BBC T\u00fcrk\u00e7e'ye g\u00f6re Ulusla: According to reports from BBC Turkish, writers from the Worldwide Association of Writers (PEN), including its presidents in England, Wales and Scotland, stated that threats and physical attacks against their colleagues, writers and publishers in Turkey have become a normal part of life.
Mektupta T\u00fcrkiye'de H\u00fcrriyet g: In the letter, the investigations and detention of journalists in Turkey were regarded as worrying developments as well as the two attacks on the Hurriyet daily newspaper, the raid on the Koza Group and detention of Vice News correspondents.
Anneye yar\u0131m \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma: Part-time work rights for mothers causes debate
T\u00fcrk-\u0130\u015f \"Kiral\u0131k i\: Türk-İş says "We think that part-time rights have been given to mothers to bring in labour for hire."
\"Bu truva at\u0131 olabilir\" derken, T: "It may be a Trojan horse", and TİSK claimed "We are worried about whether this regulation on behalf of women will prevent women from work or not".
Memur ve i\u015f\u00e7i kad\u0131n \u00e: New rights planned for civil servants and working women after giving birth or adoption were passed by the committee after day long negotiations.
Do\u011fum sonras\u0131 6 ay yar\u0131 z: "Labour for hire" became the main topic in the committee negotiations of the regulations, which will bring the right of part-time work or unpaid leave to 6 months after giving birth and part-time work up until primary school age for the child.
\u00c7ocuk ilkokula gidene kadar k\u0131: While stating that it is proper to recruit on a part-time basis until the child starts primary school they still have worries, a CHP deputy of Izmir Musa Çam added, "If you bring the labour for hire regulation, we will stand against it to the bitter end".
Komisyon g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmelerine T\: Taking part in the negotions on behalf of Türk-İş and saying they have the same worries, Enis Bağdadioğlu stated, "We have doubts about how the places for part-time working women will be filled".
Kiral\u0131k i\u015f\u00e7ili\u011fin bu: Adding that if labour for hire is added to the agenda again on this occasion there will be matters much more problematic than sub-contracted labour, Bağdadioğlu said, "We will watch the developments related to private employment agencies with much concern".
T\u0130SK Genel Sekreteri B\u00fclent Pi: The general secretary of TİSK, Bülent Pirler stated that part-time work for a period of 5 years came about with this law, and he added, "There is no part-time work for such a long period in other countries."
Also look at the matter this way.
\"1 veya 2 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan\u0131: "It is necessary to think about the consequences of this implementation in places having 1 or 2 employees".
TOBB M\u00fc\u015faviri Ahmet \u015ea\u0: TOBB advisor Ahmet Şağar also said that there will be problems finding workers if the regulation is implemented.
Yar\u0131 zamanl\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u0: Adding that there is no legislation related to the rules to be implemented on part-time work, Şağar stated, "Employers and employees should come to an agreement until regulations related to private employment agencies have been made".
Metin Feyzio\u011flu: Desteklemiyoruz: Metin Feyzioğlu: We don't support it
Feyzio\u011flu'nun a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u: The statement from Feyzioğlu is as follows: "We don't stand by this declaration; it is not possible for us to stand by and support it."
\u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc PKK'ya bir c\u00fcm: Because there isn't one sentence of criticism against the PKK.
PKK'ya, b\u00f6l\u00fcc\u00fc ter\u00f6r: You couldn't say anything unfavourable, even one sentence against this separatist terror organization, the PKK; they are considered above blame.
Sadece ve sadece devlete y\u00f6nelik sa: They are only harsh expressions to the state; we don't take those who used them seriously or find them sincere.
We are legal experts, we are lawyers.
Devleti temsil edenlerin, kamu g\u00f6re: If there is any illegal behaviour from representatives of the state, public officials and security forces in this context, let us go after it.
B\u00f6l\u00fcc\u00fclere ya da b\u00f6l: When we say "don't demolish the state" to the separatists or the relics of the period of truce who sympathise and romanticise the separatists, they attack by calling us "separatist, fascist".
\"Bu devlet hukuka uygun davranmal\u0131: When we say, "this state should behave in accordance with the law and should always value the law most", they say, "you are acting as a separatist" to us.
Biz her zaman do\u011fruyu s\u00f6ylemek: We are the people who are obliged to always tell the truth.
Van'da z\u0131rhl\u0131 araca bombal\u01: Bomb attack on an armoured car in Van
Olay, ak\u015fam saat 20.45 s\u0131ralar: The incident occurred in the evening at around 20.45 near the Akköprü primary and secondary school in the Akköprü neighbourhood of the Tuşba district centre.
PKK'l\u0131 ter\u00f6ristler taraf\u0131: Planted at the roadside by PKK terrorists, the handmade explosive was detonated via remote control while the armoured police car passed.
Olayda can kayb\u0131 ve yaralanma ya\u0: There was no loss of life or injury in the incident but material damage occurred to the armoured car.
KOCAEL\u0130: 21 ki\u015fi g\u00f6zalt\u: KOCAELİ: 21 people were taken into custody.
Ba\u015fsavc\u0131 Mustafa K\u00fc\u00e7: The chief prosecutor Mustafa Küçük stated that prosecutions were brought for the offences of "promoting propaganda of a terror organization" and "insulting the moral character of the state".
BOLU: Abant \u0130zzet Baysal \u00dcnive: BOLU: A search was conducted of the houses and university offices of 2 academics from the Science and Literature Faculty and 1 academic from the Faculty of Economics and Administrative Sciences from Abant İzzet Baysal University.
3 akademisyen savc\u0131l\u0131k\u00e7a: 3 academics were released by the prosecution office.
ERZURUM: Atat\u00fcrk \u00dcniversitesi': ERZURUM: Ramazan Kurt, a research assistant in Atatürk University, was taken into custody.
Kurt tutuklama istemiyle \u00e7\u0131kar: Kurt was released by the court to which he was taken with an appeal for detention.
\u0130STANBUL: \u0130stanbul Anadolu Ba\: ISTANBUL: Ex officio prosecution was brought against 82 lecturers from the universities in the area of responsibility of Istanbul Anatolia Chief Public Prosecutor's Office and 41 lecturers in the area of responsibility of Bakırköy Chief Public Prosecutor's Office.
VAN: Cumhuriyet Ba\u015fsavc\u0131l\u013: VAN: Chief Public Prosecutor Office brought a prosecution against 4 academics.
ZONGULDAK: G\u00f6zalt\u0131na al\u0131n: ZONGULDAK: Bülent Ecevit University Assistant Prof. Dr. Öznur Öncül, the head of the Psychology Department in the Science and Literature Faculty, who was taken into custody was released after her testimony.
G\u0130RESUN: Giresun \u00dcniversitesi: GİRESUN: The prosecution office have opened an investigation into the head of the Department of Journalism in the Tirebolu Communication Faculty of Giresun University, Associate Prof. Dr. Dilek Özhan Koçak.
BURSA: Uluda\u011f \u00dcniversitesi'nde: BURSA: 3 academics from Uludağ University were taken into custody and referred to court.
DEN\u0130ZL\u0130: Pamukkale \u00dcniver: DENİZLİ: From Pamukkale University, Prof. Dr. Mehmet Zencir was called to court to testify.
MU\u011eLA: S\u0131tk\u0131 Ko\u00e7man: MUĞLA: Sıtkı Koçman University opened an investigation into 9 academics.
B\u0130NG\u00d6L: Bing\u00f6l \u00dcnive: BİNGÖL: A member of the Science and Literature Faculty of Bingöl University, Assistant Prof. Dr. Eda Erdener was reported to have had an administrative investigation opened against her.
As\u0131l ad\u0131 Belgin Sar\u0131lm\u0: Bergen, whose real name is Belgin Sarılmışer, was born in Mersin on July 16, 1960.
Anne ve babas\u0131n\u0131n bo\u015fanma: When her parents divorced in 1966, she settled in Ankara with her mother Sebahat Çakır.
Yenimahalle Yunus Emre \u0130lkokulu'nda: After attending Yenimahalle Yunus Emre Primary School, she entered the Piano Department of Ankara State Conservatory, but left because of financial difficulties and worked at the post office for a while by lying about her age.
1979'da arkada\u015flar\u0131yla e\u011f: She accepted an offer of work after she took to the stage in the Feyman Night Club where she went for a night out with friends in 1979.
Feyman Gece Kul\u00fcb\u00fc'nde Grup Lo: In the Feyman Night Club, she performed Turkish Art Music, Turkish Light Music and popular arrangements of that time with Grup Lokomotif.
Ankara'dan sonra i\u015f i\u00e7in Adana: Moving to Adana from Ankara for work, Bergen met Halis Serbes there and married him the following year.
1982 y\u0131l\u0131nda Atlas Plak'tan il: She released her LP "I Have an Axe to Grind" with the record company Atlas Plak in 1982.
Sanat ya\u015fam\u0131ndaki \u00e7\u0131: While she was making her breakthrough in her artistic life, Bergen had to cope with a violent husband and she escaped from him many times.
Ekim 1982'de \u0130zmir'de \u00e7al\u013: In October 1982 while working in İzmir, acid was thrown in her face under the orders of her husband.
Bu sald\u0131r\u0131da tek g\u00f6z\u00f: Having lost an eye and suffering burns to much of her body, Bergan was persuaded to return to the stage by Cengiz Özşeker after her treatment, who is the composer of the song "Who Knows?" popularised by Kibariye.
1985'e kadar \u00d6z\u015feker'in sahibi: Having performed in the İzmir Pırlanta Night Club, owned by Özşeker, until 1985 , the artist prepared a demo tape called "Sister of Destiny" with her boss and sent it to Yaşar Kekeva.
Bergen'i be\u011fenen Kekeva, sanat\u00e: Kekeva, liking Bergen, invited the artist to Istanbul.
\u0130stanbul m\u00fczik piyasas\u0131nd: Releasing her first professional LP "If a Person Falls in Love" onto the Istanbul music market under the musical management of Burhan Bayar, the artist became famous with "The Woman of Sorrow", which she produced at the end of 1986.
Alb\u00fcm\u00fcn \u00e7ok be\u011fenilm: Her album was successful and in April 1987 she was awarded the Golden Record and Golden Tape prizes with the title "The Best Selling Arabesque Female Artist in 1986" by her recording company.
Ayn\u0131 y\u0131l \u00dclk\u00fc Erakal: In the same year, she appeared in front of the cameras with Yalçın Gülhan, Asuman Arsan and Meral Niron in the film "Acıların Kadını" under the direction of Ülkü Erakalın.
B\u00fcy\u00fck bir hayran kitlesi edine: Having built up a large fanbase, Bergen narrowly escaped a knife attack in Adana where she went to perform a concert.
Bir d\u00f6nem sahneyi de b\u0131rakan s: The artist, after having left the stage for a period, released her albums, "God Burn Him Too", "The Cost of Love" and "I Don't Want" under the direction of the great virtuosos Selami Şahin, Özer Şenay and Cengiz Tekin respectively.
Nisan 1989'da kocas\u0131ndan da resmen: Officially divorcing in April 1989, Bergen made her stage comeback in June 1989 with her final album "The Years Don't Forgive".
Yo\u011fun bir ilgiyle kar\u015f\u0131la: The artist, having begun a promotional tour of her album and attracting much interest, was shot and killed by her ex-husband in Pozantı, Adana on the night between August 14 to August 15, 1989.
She was buried in her hometown Mersin.
Bergen; 29 y\u0131ll\u0131k k\u0131sa ya: Bergen fit 129 songs on 5 LPs and 11 tapes, and a film into her short 29 years.
Farkl\u0131 ve g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc sesi: Attaining great success in arabesque music with her unusual and powerful voice, the artist was declared a legend, claims that were only strengthened after her album "My Youth Has Gone", released after her death, sold out in one day.

1986 - Ac\u0131lar\u0131n Kad\u0131n\u01: 1986 - Woman of Sorrow LP, MC (Re-released on CD in 1999)
1987 - Onu da Yak Tanr\u0131m LP, MC (19: 1987 - God Burn Him Too LP, MC (Re-released on CD in 1999)
1988 - Sevgimin Bedeli MC (1999'da CD ol: 1988 - The Cost of Love MC (Re-released on CD in 1999)
1988 - \u0130stemiyorum LP, MC (1999'da: 1988 - I Don't Want LP, MC (Re-released on CD in 1999)

Naz\u0131m Hikmet 114. do\u011fum g\u00f: The 114th anniversary of the birth of Nazım Hikmet was commemorated
Memleket \u015eairi olarak bilinen Naz\u: On the occasion of the 114th anniversary of his birth, Nazım Hikmet Ran, known as the Hometown Poet, was commemorated with the event "Happy Birthday Nazım" .
Konak Belediyesi taraf\u0131ndan d\u00fc: The activity, organized by the Municipality of Konak, took place in the hall named after the poet in the Güzelyalı Cultural Centre.
Etkinlikle \u015fiir ve m\u00fczik dinle: During the event, poetry and musical recitals were held and his poems were recited by the theatre and cinema actor Rüştü Asyalı.
Ayr\u0131ca etkinlikte Asyal\u0131'ya \u: In addition to this, the Üç Anadolu Singing Society accompanied the musical style of Rüştü Asyalı.
Naz\u0131m Hikmet etkinli\u011fine bir\u: Many art-lovers attended the Nazım Hikmet event.
Bu isimler aras\u0131nda Ali Se\u00e7kin: Ali Seçkiner Alıcı, Erkoç Torun, Nedim Yıldız, Zeynep Göknur Yıldız and Ziya Özsökmenler were among those who attended.
\u0130stanbul'da ise Naz\u0131m Hikmet K: In Istanbul, an activity was organized by the Nazım Hikmet Culture and Art Foundation.
Vak\u0131f Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Rutkay Aziz: Foundation President, Rutkay Aziz, and members of Nazım Hikmet's family, his wife Vera Tulyakova's daughter, son-in-law and grandson, and the actor Tarık Akan all came together for the event which took place in Tarabya.
\"Ya\u015famak bir a\u011fa\u00e7 gibi t: Poems will be read and carnations will be thrown into the sea with the saying "To live like a tree alone and free / And like a forest in brotherhood".
Sar\u0131yer Belediyesi'nin katk\u0131la: The Nazım Hikmet Chorus will perform their songs during the event organized with the support of the municipality of Sarıyer.
Naz\u0131m Hikmet 15 Ocak 1902 tarihinde: Nazım Hikmet was born on January 15, 1902.
D\u00fcnyaca \u00fcnl\u00fc \u015eair Na: The poems of the worldwide-famous poet Nazım Hikmet were translated into more than 50 languages.
Siyasi d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnceleri y\u00f: He was detained many times because of his political opinions and lived most of his adult life in jail or exile.
\u015eiirleri elliden fazla dile \u00e7e: His poems were translated into more than fifty languages and his works received many awards.
Bursa Nil\u00fcfer Belediyesi, d\u00fcny: The municipality of Nilüfer, Bursa carried out special events for the 114th birthday of the world renowned poet Nazım Hikmet.
Naz\u0131m'\u0131n 11 y\u0131ll\u0131k B: Carrying out events to mark the documentary "Nazım of Bursa" which recalls the 11 years Nazım spent in the prison of Bursa, the municipality also issued individual stamps for the poet for the first time in Turkish history.
B\u00f6ylece, PTT i\u015fbirli\u011fiyle: The first stamp in Turkish history portraying an individual was issued in the name of Nazım Hikmet with the collaboration of the Turkish postal service "PTT".

AB'de \"T\u00fcrkiye'ye 3 milyar euro\": "3 billion euros to Turkey" crisis in EU
T\u00dcRK\u0130YE'ye m\u00fclteciler i\u: The crisis is continuing with 3 billion euros pledged to TURKEY for the refugees.

\u0130talya ile Avrupa'n\u0131n geri kal: Stating that the mood between Italy and the rest of Europe is not good, Juncker underlined that the EU has to find the 3 billion euros.

\u0130talya, T\u00fcrkiye s\u00f6z konus: Italy is one of the countries drawing attention for their positive attitudes when it comes to Turkey.

\u0130talya ile AB aras\u0131nda bir s\u: There has been tension between Italy and the EU for a while now.

\"Renzi'nin ki, kendisini \u00e7ok sever: "It is wrong of Renzi, even though I like him very much, to humiliate the European Commission on every occasion".

Chalie Hebdo karikat\u00fcr\u00fcn\u00fc: I cried when I saw the Charlie Hebdo cartoon
Rus resmi haber ajans\u0131 Sputnik'e ko: Speaking to the Russian official news agency Sputnik, the father Abdullah Kurdi reacted strongly and said, "to tell the truth, I cried because of that cartoon."
U\u011frad\u0131\u011f\u0131 silahl\u013: Stating that he expected positive things from the French satirical magazine Charlie Hebdo, which has become the symbol of freedom of expression after the armed attack, Kurdi added the following:

Bu karikat\u00fcre herkes \u00e7ok \u00f: Everybody felt very sad about this cartoon.
Aylan 2 ya\u015f\u0131ndaki bir \u00e7oc: Aylan is a 2 year old boy and he died.
Aylan'a, bana ve aileme Charlie Hebdo'nu: Charlie Hebdo was supposed to show respect to Aylan, to me and my family, but the exact opposite is true.
Bu dergi \u00f6len \u00e7ocuk insanlara: This magazine should show respect to the dead children.
Peygamber efendimizle ilgili sayg\u0131s: They published a disrespectful cartoon about our honourable Prophet.
Allah \u00fczerine dahi yay\u0131nlar ya: They even made publications regarding Allah.
Allah ve Peygamber kar\u015f\u0131s\u013: Compared with the publications on Allah and our Prophet, what they done to my son is a small thing.
Erbil'de ya\u015fan Kurdi \u015fu \u00e7: Kurdi, living in Erbil, made the following appeal: "I call on the whole world and the satirical magazines to show respect to all the dead children."
Onlar\u0131n ailelerini \u00fczmemeli ac: They should not add to the grief the families are already suffering.
Aylan Kurdi'nin Kanada'da ya\u015fayan h: Tima Kurdi, an aunt of Aylan Kurdi living in Canada, is also among those to react to the cartoon.
Laurent 'Riss' Sourisseau, imzal\u0131 k: In the cartoon by Laurent "Riss" Sourisseau, it is implied that 3 year old Syrian Aylan Kurdi, whose dead body came ashore at Bodrum, "may have become one of the sex abusers in Germany when he grows up".
Ge\u00e7en y\u0131l Hz. Muhammed karikat: Last year, having been exposed to an attack in which religious radicals killed 12 people because of the publication of cartoons depicting Muhammad, French satirical magazine Charlie Hebdo become the focus of discussions with its cartoon of Aylan Kurdi.
Karikat\u00fcrde, Almanya'n\u0131n ba\u0: In the cartoon the molesters, with pig heads, evoking immigrants and also chasing women, who were portrayed like the women abused during the new year celebrations in Germany, especially Cologne.
Sosyal medyada farkl\u0131 tepkilere seb: Having stirred up different reactions on social media, the cartoon is part of a column consisting of 4 frames.
Kolonun \u00fczerinde \"Fransa bu de\u01: "This is not France" is written on the column, and the lost values of France and increasing hostility against refugees are criticized according to many readers.
Di\u011fer yandan karikat\u00fcr yine de: On the other hand, the cartoon caused many people to accuse Charlie Hebdo of racism.
Charlie Hebdo dergisi, ge\u00e7en y\u013: While Charlie Hebdo praised Germany, which accepted 800 thousand refugees, it criticized France for its unwilling attitude towards opening its doors to refugees in an issue published last year.
Karikat\u00fcrde \"Amac\u0131na \u00e7ok: It was said in the cartoon "the goal was too close" and "two children's menus for the price of one" was written in the advertising poster.

Buharda pi\u015firmenin faydalar\u0131 n: What are the benefits of steam cooking?
Besinlerin i\u00e7erisindeki vitamin ve: A technique that does not kill vitamins and minerals in food, steam cooking is becoming increasingly popular.
Y\u00fczy\u0131llard\u0131r Uzakdo\u011f: Steam cooking, one of the most preferred cooking methods in the Far-East for centuries, strengthens the metabolism and makes digestion easier.
Haz\u0131ms\u0131zl\u0131k gibi sorunlar: Bacteria and germs in food are completely eradicated with this method, which also eliminates problems such as dyspepsia.
Besin i\u00e7erisindeki protein, sel\u00: Substances found in foods such as protein, cellulose and starch completely disolve using this technique, making the food softer.
D\u00fc\u015f\u00fck bas\u0131n\u00e7ta: Taking place in low pressure, steam cooking is done in a cooking pot with the help of steam pots or steam machines.
Y\u00fcksek bas\u0131n\u00e7ta pi\u015fi: Both the amount of water used and the cooking time is less when cooking at high pressure.
Buna en iyi \u00f6rnek olarak d\u00fcd\u: The best example of this is cooking in a pressure cooker.
\u00d6zellikle diyet men\u00fclerinde ye: Especially for cooking dietary foods such as vegetables, it is necessary to wash the vegetables well first, and then it is necessary to put them into a strainer and wait for the water to strain.
Derin bir tencere \u00fc\u00e7te bir ora: One-third of a deep cooking pot is filled with water and a steam strainer is placed inside the pot.
Tencerenin a\u011fz\u0131 yar\u0131 kapa: The mouth of the cooking pot is half closed.
B\u00f6ylece buhar\u0131n tencereden d\u: In this way, we allow steam to escape from the cooking pot.
Ocak ate\u015fi ilk \u00f6nce en y\u00fc: Firstly the heat of the oven is set to the highest degree and the water is boiled; after the temperature is fixed by setting the heat in the oven to a lower degree.
Buharda yakla\u015f\u0131k 10 - 15 dakik: The vegetables and food are steam cooked for 10-15 minutes and are then checked with the help of a fork once they are cooked.
Pi\u015fmi\u015f olan sebzeler ocaktan a: The cooked vegetables are removed from the oven and served on plates.
Buharda pi\u015firme tekni\u011finde bes: Appearance, colour and aroma of the food do not change with the steam cooking technique; therefore this is a healthy method.
Yiyece\u011fin kendine \u00f6zg\u00fc ta: The distinctive taste of the food stays the same.
B\u00f6ylece yiyece\u011fin kalitesi ve: Therefore the quality and flavour of the food are not spoiled.
Ayn\u0131 zamanda en ekonomik pi\u015fir: Loss of nutrition is kept to a minimum in steam cooking, which is also the most economical way of cooking.
Buharda pi\u015firilen sebzeler daha dir: Steamed vegetables offer a satisfactory flavour for the diner with their fresh and vibrant appearance.
\u00d6zellikle diyet yemeklerinde s\u013: Frequently used, especially as part of a diet, this method is often preferred also because it is very light.
David Bowie - Blackstar: Uzayl\u0131n\u0: David Bowie - Blackstar: The alien's "last album"
\u00d6lece\u011fini bilmek; bunu kimsele: Knowing that you will die; producing that final album without telling anyone; making your deathbed an artistic expression in the music video you shot...
Bu gibi i\u015fler; biz d\u00fcnyal\u013: These kinds of actions may seem "extreme" to us mortal earthlings.
D\u00fcnyal\u0131 faniler diyorum \u00e7: I say mortal earthlings because I am among those who believe that the man who did this is both immortal and alien.
Evrenin ba\u015fka bir k\u00f6\u015fesin: He came to our world from some corner of the universe; now he has returned to his motherland; which is just how it goes.
Geldi \u00e7\u00fcnk\u00fc sadece Kiss,: He came because it was necessary to inspire not only Kiss, Marilyn Manson or Lady Gaga, but also all the singers of the world.
G\u00f6revini lay\u0131k\u0131yla tamaml: He fulfilled his duty with success.
David Bowie, Blackstar, iTunes fiyat\u01: David Bowie, Blackstar, iTunes price: 9.99 TL 5/5
Muhtemelen onunla ayn\u0131 gezegenden o: Maybe he was nourished by Warhol and Kubrick from the same planet as him.
Apollo 11, Ay'a indi\u011finde \"Bu da b: When Apollo 11 landed on earth, he decided to say "this is nothing, I am an alien", and he joined us by singing "Space Oddity".
Asl\u0131nda kar\u0131\u015fmad\u0131; h: Actually he did not join us; he was always ahead of us.
\u00c7ok ki\u015fi onun sayesinde kaybet: Thanks to him, many people found their way.
Plastik sanatlarla ilgilenmesini, oyuncu: If we leave aside his interest in plastic arts, his acting etc., it would be wrong to say that his music was "just music".
\u015eark\u0131dan \u015fark\u0131ya dol: The characters he created by himself, travelling from song to song, his references, innovation, taboo-breaking behaviour and discography reflect an artistic integrity for me.
Ne glam rock'un atas\u0131 olarak anabil: I can remember him neither as the father of glam rock, nor as the cousin of punk...
\u00d6yle anarsam o avangart elektronik: If I remember him like that, what will happen to his avant-garde and electronic works, and to jazz, which he kept as an internal love since his childhood?
David Bowie \"ikon\" tabirini a\u011fz\u: David Bowie always reminded us what the expression "icon" means, up until that time when the word spread like wildfire.
Erkek de\u011fildi, kad\u0131n de\u011fi: He was not a man; he was not a woman; he was not "human".
Bize bir misyon sebebiyle bir s\u00fcre: It seemed to us that he was on a mission.
O v\u00fccut; 26\"nc\u0131 st\u00fcdyo a: That body left this world two days after the release of his 26th studio album "Blackstar".
Alb\u00fcm yay\u0131mlanmadan \u00f6nce: He tried to prepare us for the fact that he would leave with "Blackstar" and "Lazarus", which we had listened to before the release of the album.
Biz \"Ya\u015fland\u0131 art\u0131k, \u0: We thought that "he has gotten old now, so he talks about death", but he was aware of everything.
Alb\u00fcm\u00fcn mesaj ve duygu y\u00fc: We can say that there are four songs that we already knew when the album was released; "Blackstar" and "Lazarus", shouldering the burden of message and emotion, "Sue (Or In A Season Of Crime)" and "Tis A Pity She Was A Whore", previously released but re-recorded for this album.
Geriye kalanlar; yani \"Girl Loves Me\",: I would add that the remaining songs, "Girl Loves Me", "I Can't Give Everything Away" and "Dollar Days", are also very good.
B\u00fct\u00fcn\u00fcyle bakt\u0131\u011: When we look at "Blackstar" as a whole, it was created on a very strong musical structure, but it feels like it was produced with sincere and instantaneous feelings as well.
Ne \u00f6l\u00fcm ne de bir \"ge\u00e7mi: It is an album neither of death nor a "reckoning with the past"...
Sadece ger\u00e7ek bir \"son\" alb\u00fc: It is just a real "final" album.
Ba\u015ftan sona ba\u015fyap\u0131t olan: "The End" caption of a life in music, which is a masterpiece in its entirety.
Sultanahmet sald\u0131r\u0131s\u0131nda: Turkey was targeted in the Sultanahmet attack

Ankara ve \u0130stanbul'da ekme\u011fe 2: A price increase of 25 kuruş on bread in Ankara and Istanbul
Ankara'da, d\u00fcn itibar\u0131yla 250: With an increase of 25 kuruş, 250g of bread began to be sold for 1 TL as of yesterday in Ankara.
Yeni y\u0131l \u00f6ncesi, \u00f6zellikl: Upon speculation that "the price of bread would increase" before the new year, especially in December, Faruk Çelik, minister of food, agriculture and livestock, and Bülent Tüfekçi, minister of customs and trade stated that "there would be no price increase".
Ancak, ba\u015fkent Ankara'da, 250 gram: However, 250g of bread was selling for 1 TL yesterday in the capital, Ankara.
Ekme\u011fe gelen 25 kuru\u015fluk zamla: The head of the Turkish Bakers' Federation, Halil İbrahim Balcı stated that, regarding the 25 kuruş price increase on bread, "No price increase was imposed, the price list of 2 years ago began to be applied" and added:
\"Bu 2 y\u0131l \u00f6nce al\u0131nm\u01: "It was a price decision taken 2 years ago."
Esnaf Odalar\u0131 Birli\u011fi 2 y\u013: The Chamber of Merchants' union decided on this price 2 years ago.
T\u00fcrkiye genelinde uygulanan bir fiy: It is a price implemented throughout Turkey.
Yani yeni bir zam m\u00fcracaat\u0131 ya: In other words, there was no application and implementation of a price increase.

Baz\u0131 b\u00f6lgelerde ise zaten 1 TL: In other regions, it was already being sold for 1 TL.
Tezgah\u0131na, ekme\u011fine g\u00fcven: Bakers, confident about the quality of their bread, did not decrease their prices. They have to implement 1 TL due to competition.
Uygulanmam\u0131\u015f fiyat\u0131 uygul: They are implementing the price that had not been implemented before.
\"2016'n\u0131n ilk yar\u0131s\u0131nda: "The price of bread per kilo certainly won't exceed 5 TL in the first half of 2016, and we will end this year with this price if we do not experience any major problems".
\u0130stanbul'un da baz\u0131 b\u00f6lge: In some areas of Istanbul, bread started to be sold for 1.25 TL.

S\u00f6mestr yar\u0131y\u0131l tatili na: How to use the mid-term break?
\u00d6\u011frenciler yar\u0131y\u0131l t: How should students use the mid-term break? - we asked this question to educational specialist and student coach, Murat Aydın.
Yar\u0131y\u0131l tatili \u00f6\u011fren: Students should not only think of mid-term break as spending time resting, entertaining and watching television.
Yar\u0131y\u0131l tatili; yeni e\u011fit: Mid-term break is an important opportunity to get ready for the new school term and to review last term.
Bo\u015f zaman diye adland\u0131r\u0131l: Being free time, the mid-term break is also a good opportunity for personality development, acquisition of knowledge and skills, and taking up a new hobby.
Yar\u0131y\u0131l\u0131 de\u011ferlendir: Make a list of what to do during the term.
Yapaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131z, planlad\u013: Write down everything you plan to do, and try to put it into practice.
Emin olunki bundan keyif alacak ve gayet: You can be sure that you will benefit from this and have a more efficient term.
\u015eimdi \u00f6ncelikli olarak YGS-LYS: Now, firstly, let's talk about how efficient the term should be for students preparing for the YGS-LYS exams.
\u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc YGS-LYS s\u0131navl: Because the most common questions coming from the students preparing for YGS-LYS are as follows: "How should we use this time, should we solve a lot of questions or finish incomplete subjects?"
Hem bunlara cevap vermek hem de verimli: Firstly, lets introduce our article with both the answers to these questions and some advice to those who are preparing for the exam in order to spend the time efficiently.
S\u0131nava haz\u0131rl\u0131k s\u00fcre: While the preparation period for the exams should be a process that starts from the 9th grade, under normal conditions, we are trying instead to complete it in the final 1 year; this obliges us to spend our last year more effectively, by using our time more efficiently and properly.
Son s\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011frencisi: A final grade student must deal with both the exam preparation and preparation for school written exams at the same time.
Okulu tamamlam\u0131\u015f mezun \u00f6\: Even if the graduate students have finished school and experienced the exam (YGS-LYS) at least once, the year they prepare for the exam again as a graduate student is critically important for them as well.
\u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc \u00e7o\u011fu mezu: Because most graduate students and their families see "that" year as a last chance, which creates greater stress.
Ders \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmak; \u00f6\u01: Revision is the study that students do not like; they do it because they feel obliged to do it; and therefore they always postpone it to the last moment; but it becomes completely a duty for the students that do it regularly and make it a habit; and there is always a plan for what and when things need to be done.
\u015eimdi \u00f6n\u00fcm\u00fczde yar\u: Now we have a mid-term break ahead of us and we have to use it in the best way possible.
Bunun i\u00e7in de mutlaka elimizde zama: To do this, we should always have a plan that allows us to manage our time well.
Yar\u0131 Y\u0131l Tatilinde Ders \u00c7: Studying for Lessons during mid-term break:
Herkes \u00f6ncelikli olarak kendi durum: Firstly, everyone should make a plan suitable to their situation.
1.d\u00f6nem neler halledildi, neler eks: 1. They should include what they have covered, what are the incomplete subjects in their plan and they should plan their days, weeks and 15-day periods.
Bu d\u00f6nem i\u00e7erisinde hem konu t: There should be both lesson revision and question solving in this period.
Ayn\u0131 zamanda eksi\u011fi \u00e7ok f: In the meantime, students that do not have any incomplete subjects can solve 1 or 2 mock exams on average.
Eksik Konular\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 Halled: Deal with Your Incomplete Subjects: Studies show that people forget 75 percent of what they learn in a week, 66 percent in a day, and 54 percent in an hour.
Unutmay\u0131 ortadan kald\u0131rman\u01: The best and most effective method of eliminating this tendency to forget is by doing revision.
\u00d6zellikle ge\u00e7mi\u015f konulard: Especially students who make too many errors in prior lessons should concentrate on studying with general revision.
Eksik konular\u0131n\u0131z\u0131 \u00f6: Firstly, determine what are the incomplete subjects and make your plan everyday; choose one lesson everyday and completely deal with it.
Bu planlama, sizi hem akademik hem de ps: This planning will help you in both academic and psychological situations.
Konular\u0131 plan\u0131n\u0131za yerle\: When adding subjects to your plan, pay attention to the subjects you make the most errors in.
\u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc ilerleyen zamanlard: Because there will be no long holiday periods in the future.
Konu tekrar\u0131 yapmak kadar soru \u00: Question solving is as important as revising lessons.
\u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc yapt\u0131\u011f\u0: Because we can see how much we understand the subjects we study only through the feedback from the questions we solve.
Her g\u00fcne belli bir soru \u00e7\u00f: Do not forget to select a number of questions to be solved each day.
\u00c7\u00f6zece\u011finiz soru say\u013: The number of questions you solve may change in line with what you study; you may not solve many questions on a day that you mostly study lessons, but we should still solve questions to a certain extent, at least in order to see how much we learned from the lesson of that day.
Yar\u0131 y\u0131l tatilinde yapaca\u011: Another area of study to look into during mid-term break should be solving mock exams.
Her ne kadar konular\u0131n tamam\u0131: Even if all the subjects are not finished, you can solve mock exams at least for each lesson.
Diyelim ki; T\u00fcrk\u00e7e dersini b\u: Supposing that you finished a Turkish lesson, you can solve a 40-question mock exam of Turkish.
Ve mutlaka bunu yaparken de s\u00fcre \u: You should definitely keep track of time while doing this.
40 T\u00fcrk\u00e7e sorusunu e\u011fer i: If you solve 40 Turkish questions in 60 minutes, your next target should be to complete it several minutes faster.
Tatil demek tabi ki sadece ders \u00e7al: Of course, a break does not only mean studying for lessons, you should spare a few days for vacation, to rest and spend time on your hobbies.
Sadece ders \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmakla ge: A holiday period spent only studying for lessons will stop you from having fun and relaxing.
Bu y\u00fczden, planlar\u0131n\u0131z i\: For this reason, there should be special time set aside for yourself.
Kitap okumak, televizyon izlemek, intern: Reading books, watching television or surfing the internet may be in your plans, but the most important thing is how much time you spare for each activity.
\u0130lk d\u00f6nemi verimli ge\u00e7ire: I have some advice for those who say that I could not spend the first term efficiently.
E\u011fer; benim ilk d\u00f6nemim \u00e7: If you can say that I could not spend the first term well, I could not study much and I missed many lessons, this mid-term break is a big opportunity for you as well.
Ama \u00f6ncelikli olarak buna karar ver: Nevertheless, you should firstly decide on and believe this.

Herbiri ortalama 1.000 metrekarelik 45 m: The founder of Kervan, one of the biggest "home" chain stores in Turkey with 45 stores of 1000 square meters on average, Şinasi Demirel and his son Hasan have now incorporated Home Sweet Home, which has 17 stores abroad and 25 stores here in Turkey.

Halen yurt d\u0131\u015f\u0131nda Kervan: Stating that there are still no Kervan stores abroad, Şinasi Demirel said, "From now on, we will continue with big retailing with Kervan and smaller retailing with Home Sweet Home."
2015 cirosu 50 milyon lira olan Home Swe: A retail chain and producer with a turnover of 140 million Turkish Lira was created with the merger of Home Sweet Home, with a 50 million Turkish Lira turnover, and Kervan, with a 90 million Turkish Lira turnover in 2015.
35 ilde 45 ma\u011fas\u0131 bulunan Kerv: Kervan's total retail area, with 45 stores in 35 provinces, is 45 thousand square metres.
Ma\u011fazalar\u0131n 25'i ana \u015firk: 25 of the stores belong to the parent company.
Kervan'da yakla\u015f\u0131k 500 ki\u015: There are around 500 people employed by Kervan.
Home Sweet Home'un ise yurt i\u00e7inde: Home Sweet Home has 25 stores in Turkey and 17 stores abroad, its total retail area is 6500 square metres, and its number of employees is around 320.
Orta\u011f\u0131 Alev Pakten ile \u00fcr: Carrying out production, export and retailing with his partner Alev Pakten, Home Sweet Home's Chairman, Kadir Kalaycıoğlu stated that they are very happy with the merger with Kervan and added, "We are from Mardin and entered this sector in 1998."
Ba\u015ftan beri \u015einasi Beylerin de: From the very beginning, we created a brand with the support of Mr. Şinasi.
\u015einasi Bey bu sekt\u00f6r\u00fcn 'T: Mr. Şinasi is like the "TRT" of this sector.
Biz de ondan \u00e7ok \u015fey \u00f6\u0: We learned a lot from him as well.
Hatta ma\u011fazac\u0131l\u0131\u011fa i: Moreover, we took our first steps in retail when he gave us his store in Akmerkez.
Kervan ile zaten bir rakip gibi de\u011f: In fact, we were working with Kervan as a strategical partner, not a rival.
\"\u015eimdi bu birle\u015fme ile \u00e7: "From now on, a very important synergy will emerge with this merger."
Kalayc\u0131o\u011flu, \u015fu anda Home: Kalaycıoğlu explained that there are 17 Home Sweet Home stores abroad, most of which are in the Middle East; and they started exports to China last month.
Kalayc\u0131o\u011flu, \"\u015eangay'da: Kalaycıoğlu said, "We opened our first corner in Shanghai."
200 ma\u011fazal\u0131 bir zincirle anla: We agreed with a chain store which has 200 stores.
\"Bundan sonra yurt d\u0131\u015f\u0131n: "From now on, we will develop big retailing as Kervan and small retailing with Home Sweet Home abroad".

Kemal K\u0131l\u0131\u00e7daro\u011flu b: Kemal Kılıçdaroğlu was elected as General President again

K\u0131l\u0131\u00e7daro\u011flu kurulta: In the congress, Kılıçdaroğlu stated the following in his summary:

Akan kan\u0131n, g\u00f6zya\u015f\u0131n: The government is responsible for all the bloodshed, tears and victims.
2002'de s\u0131f\u0131r ter\u00f6rle \u0: They took over this country with zero terrorism in 2002, but today Turkey has turned into a bloodbath.
Diyarbak\u0131r'daki taksi \u015fof\u00f: The taxi driver Şehmuz in Diyarbakır?
Neyin bedelini \u00f6d\u00fcyor T\u00fcr: For what does Turkey pay the price?
Darbe yasalar\u0131n\u0131n de\u011fi\u0: We will participate genuinely in the meetings to change the coup d'etat laws, we will offer our opinions.

\"Gelin darbeci ruhu de\u011fi\u015ftire: I say, "Let's change the pro-coup mindset".

Ben de ona sormak istiyorum, devletin ek: I would also like to ask him; those who benefit from the state, and use all the opportunities of the state, why don't they think about it when they rob the country?
CHP en b\u00fcy\u00fck de\u011fi\u015fim: CHP is the party that brought the biggest changes to this country.

\"ABD ekonomisindeki etkilerin ne olaca\: "There's a lot of uncertainty about what the impacts on the U.S. economy are going to be, and they have almost no data to rely on that post-dates the developments in China," Oliner said.
K\u00fcresel ekonominin sa\u011fl\u0131\: The health of the global economy isn't one of the Fed's primary concerns, so technically it shouldn't be factored into its decision-making.
Ancak ger\u00e7ekte Fed d\u00fcnyan\u013: But, in effect, the Fed has become the monetary authority of the world.
Merkez bankas\u0131n\u0131n son y\u0131l: The central bank's influence in recent years has been enormous.
O zamana kadar Ba\u015fkan Ben S. Bernan: The mere hint by then-Chairman Ben S. Bernanke in 2013 that the Fed might "taper" its monetary expansion triggered market convulsions around the globe.
Piyasalar\u0131n ve ekonomilerin giderek: In a world where markets and economies are increasingly intertwined, Fed officials can be expected not only to monitor the developments elsewhere but also to consult with other central bankers and experts to get a better read on the global economy.
Varl\u0131k y\u00f6netimi firmas\u0131 E: Its decision-making process is "more art than science," said Zachary Karabell, head of global strategy for wealth-management firm Envestnet Inc.
Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond, Va. Ba: Jeffrey Lacker, president of the Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond, Va., noted this month that "the Fed has a history of overreacting to financial market movements that seem unconnected to economic fundamentals."
Politika yap\u0131c\u0131 Federal A\u00e: Lacker, a voting member of the policymaking Federal Open Market Committee who has been pushing for a rate increase, cited decisions in 1998-99 as an example.
Lacker, \"ABD b\u00fcy\u00fcmesi i\u00e7: A financial crisis in Asia led the Fed to cut its benchmark rate by 0.75 percentage point over three meetings "despite limited identifiable implications for U.S. growth," Lacker said.
Bir y\u0131l sonra Fed g\u00f6revlileri: A year later, Fed officials reversed those cuts.
\u0130ngiltere Merkez Bankas\u0131 oran: The Fed should put financial stability concerns first only during a major crisis, such as the 2008 market meltdown, said Adam S. Posen, a former member of the Bank of England's rate-setting committee.
Son \u00e7alkant\u0131 bu seviyeye yakla: The latest turmoil doesn't come close to that level, he said.
Piyasalar k\u00fcsk\u00fcn oldu\u011fu i: "You certainly don't want to be put in a situation of being scared of a rate hike because markets got upset," said Posen, president of the Peterson Institute for International Economics.
Merkez Bankas\u0131 Yasas\u0131 hala iki: The Federal Reserve Act still has the dual mandate and does not mention financial stability, and until that is changed, I don't think they should get ahead of the curve.

Orta derecede obez olan diyabet hastalar: For mildly obese diabetics, weight loss surgery may be helpful
Yeni bir ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya g\u00f6re: The benefits of weight loss surgery for mildly obese people with type 2 diabetes can last at least five years, according to a new study.
Ancak orta derecede obez olan diyabet ha: It's still to early to say whether mildly obese people with diabetes live longer after weight loss surgery than those who receive non-surgical treatments, however.
JAMA ameliyat\u0131 \u00fczerine y\u00fc: "The mortality data take a long time to show up," said Dr. Robin Blackstone, a weight loss surgery expert who wrote an editorial on the new study in JAMA Surgery.
Kilo kayb\u0131 ameliyatlar\u0131, di\u0: Weight loss operations, or bariatric surgery, use various methods to shrink the size of the stomach.
Bunlar a\u00e7l\u0131\u011f\u0131 azalt\: They reduce hunger and limit the body's ability to absorb food.
Y\u0131llar i\u00e7erisinde, bariatrik c: Over the years, bariatric surgeries have proved effective for treating type 2 diabetes, but most studies were done in people who are morbidly obese, with a body mass index (BMI) of 35 or above.
Kilonun boyla orant\u0131s\u0131 \u00fcz: BMI, a measure of weight in relation to height, is considered normal between 18.5 and 24.9.
25 veya \u00fczeri BMI ki\u015finin fazl: A BMI of 25 or higher indicates that someone is overweight, and people with a BMI over 30 are considered obese.
BMI \u015fu linkten hesap edebilirsiniz:: You can calculate your BMI here: 1.usa.gov/1D0ZqDv.
Yeni ara\u015ft\u0131rmada, Tayvan'\u013: For the new study, researchers from Taiwan's Min-Sheng General Hospital used data collected since 2007 in a trial comparing two kinds of bariatric surgery - gastric bypass and sleeve gastrectomy - to medical treatments for type 2 diabetes in people who were mildly obese.
Ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n be\u015finci: The average BMI among those who had surgery fell from 31 to 24.5 by the end of their fifth year in the study.
Buna mukabil, cerrahi-d\u0131\u015f\u013: Meanwhile, the BMI among those receiving non-surgical diabetes treatments stayed about the same at 29.
Diyabet, ameliyat olanlar\u0131n % 36's\: Among those who had surgery, diabetes resolved completely in 36 percent and partially in 28 percent.
T\u0131bbi yollardan tedavi g\u00f6ren g: In the medically-treated group, by comparison, diabetes resolved completely in only 1 percent and partially in only about 2 percent.
Ayr\u0131ca yazarlar\u0131n belirtti\u01: In addition, control of blood pressure, triglycerides, and "bad" LDL cholesterol "was generally better in the surgical group," the authors found.
Ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar, ayn\u0131: The researchers also monitored patients' blood levels of hemoglobin A1c, which reflect blood sugar levels over time.
Ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar\u0131n yaz: Hemoglobin A1c is best kept below 7 percent, the researchers write.
Ameliyat sonras\u0131 A1c hemoglobini or: After surgery, the average hemoglobin A1c level fell from about 9 percent to about 6 percent.
T\u0131bbi tedavi g\u00f6ren grupta ise: In the medical therapy group, however, it remained steady at about 8 percent.
Ancak d\u00fczelen A1c hemoglobin seviye: But this better "glycemic control" - as reflected by the improved hemoglobin A1c levels - did not reduce the mortality rate at five years, according to lead researcher Dr. Chih-Cheng Hsu and colleagues.
Ara\u015ft\u0131rma ekibi eldeki bulgula: The research team also compared average outcomes with the two types of surgery.
Be\u015finci senede, t\u00fcp mide ameli: At the fifth year, compared to the sleeve gastrectomy group, the bypass surgery group had lost more weight (18.7 vs 14.2 kg), achieved larger drops in BMI (7.4 vs 5.1) and in hemoglobin A1c (3.1 percent vs 2.1 percent) and were more likely to have complete diabetes remission (46.9 percent vs 16.7 percent).
Ara\u015ft\u0131rma be\u015finci y\u0131: While the new study does not show a survival benefit or surgery after five years, there is evidence from a study of heavier people in Sweden that surgery does lead to a longer life, says Blackstone, of the University of Arizona College of Medicine-Phoenix.
\u0130sve\u00e7li bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015: In the Swedish study, obese people who had bariatric surgery were about 29 percent less likely to die over 15 years, compared to a group who tried more conventional methods.
Her ne kadar bu yeni \u00e7al\u0131\u015: Though the new study didn't show a benefit in survival among surgery patients, Blackstone said it's reassuring for people with a BMI under 35 interested in the procedure.
Makalenin en can al\u0131c\u0131 k\u0131: "This is where this paper is critical, because it says this surgery is safe in that lower BMI group," with no increased risk of death or renal disease, she said.
Blackstone, insanlar\u0131n ve doktorlar: Blackstone added that people and their doctors should start taking weight seriously once the patient's BMI falls between 27 and 30.
San\u0131r\u0131m insanlar\u0131n bu mes: "I think we wait too long to get people to be serious about this," she said.
Bence bedenlerini obezite ve diyabetle i: I think that once they've accumulated these genetic changes that hardwired their bodies into obesity and diabetes, reversing that is really hard.

Amerika Birle\u015fik Eyaletleri'ndeki z: Poison control centers around the United States have reported a nearly 400-percent uptick since 2010 in the number of children under the age of 12 swallowing highly-alcoholic hand sanitizer, according to the Georgia Poison Center.

Daha \u00e7ekici gelenlerin (el antisept: A lot of the more attractive (hand sanitizers) are the ones that are scented.
\u00c7ocuklara son derece cazip gelen \u: There are strawberry, grape, orange-flavored hand sanitizers that are very appealing to kids.

\u00d6zellikle de k\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck \: In young children, especially, only a few squirts can cause alcohol poisoning.

\u00c7ocu\u011fum i\u00e7in \u00f6ld\u00: It could have been very lethal for my child.

Bilim, Sanayi ve Teknoloji Bakan\u0131 F: Stating that a new agreement was made with Saudi Arabia for the second batch sale of Ballistic Image Analysing and Recognition Systems (BALİSTİKA) from the Scientific and Technological Research Council of Turkey (TÜBİTAK), Fikri Işık, the Minister of Science, Industry and Technology said, "the number of BALİSTİKA to serve Saudi Arabia will increase from 6 to 14 with the agreement covering the development and installation of an additional 8 systems".

I\u015f\u0131k, BAL\u0130ST\u0130KA'n\u0: Işık stated that a new agreement was done for the second batch sale of BALİSTİKA to Saudi Arabia, and SUBA-2 was signed as the follow-up of SUBA-1, and said that the number of BALİSTİKA to serve Saudi Arabia will increase from 6 to 14 with the agreement including the development and installation of 8 additional systems.

'Poz' ve 'Kuru S\u0131k\u0131' adl\u0131: Uçer, whose plays "Poz" and "Kuru Sıkı" are still ongoing, had her first experience of script writing and directing in the play, which questions the confusion in women's minds.

Pencerenin kenar\u0131nda durmu\u015f, a: A woman, who is sitting on a window ledge, is on the verge of jumping.

Deniz \u00c7ak\u0131r'\u0131n canland\u0: "Ebru Uysal", played by Deniz Çakır, is a popular writer.
Kocas\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan terk edilmi\: She was left by her husband, but this is not the only reason.
\u00c7ocuklu\u011fundan beri biriken \u0: There are some things that have accumulated inside her.

\u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc yan dairenin geveze: Because "Aysel" (Zeynep Kankonde), the prattling, gullible cleaner and next-door neighbour, and "Perran" (Şebnem Sönmez), the mysterious woman in the opposite flat, draw her into conversation.

\u00dc\u00e7l\u00fc aras\u0131ndaki sohb: When the famous singer "Meltem Kaya" (İpek Türktan Kaynak), who is having her home cleaned, joins the conversation between the three, the situation turns into a clamour of voices.

\u015eark\u0131c\u0131 'Meltem'in bas\u0: The situation gets out of hand when the singer "Meltem" gives very inaccurate information to the press.

Diyarbak\u0131r'\u0131n merkez Sur il\u0: Letters poured in from children in the west for the purpose of boosting the morale of police and soldiers carrying out anti-terrorist operations in the region, particularly the central Sur district of Diyarbakır.

Rusya, T\u00fcrkiye'nin sundu\u011fu hiz: While Russia is preparing to recognise the status of "able to do business with Russia" for Turkish companies if it cannot replace the services offered by Turkey, the head of the Russian Tour Operators Union stated, "Russian citizens do not give up on Turkey".
T\u00fcrkiye ile mevcut ekonomik ba\u011: Calculating that cutting current economic ties with Turkey will bring additional costs to Russia, the Ministry of Economic Development for Russia prepared a new "exceptional cases" bill for the Russian Government regarding Turkey.

Tasla\u011fa g\u00f6re, T\u00fcrkiye d\u: According to the proposal, goods and services from Turkish companies and firms will be used in cases where it is impossible to provide them from sources other than Turkey and domestic production in Russia brings serious additional costs.

\u00d6yle ya da b\u00f6yle yapt\u0131r\u: One way or another, sanctions are being eased one by one.

Richard Glossip'in masum oldu\u011fu kon: I cannot say with certainty that Richard Glossip is innocent.

FriendsFest: erkekler aras\u0131 arkada\: FriendsFest: the comedy show that taught us serious lessons about male friendship
Programlarda benzer portelerin yoklu\u01: The absence of similar portrayals in shows is glaring, particularly given how the need for men to open up is more desperate now than ever, with suicide rates amongst young males at 15 year high.
2013 y\u0131l\u0131nda bu 20-45 ya\u015f: In 2013, it was the single biggest cause of death in men aged 20-45 in the UK, and remains three times more common in males than females.
Bu probleme dikkat \u00e7ekmek i\u00e7in: In a bid to address the problem, the Campaign Against Living Miserably (CALM) announced 2015 as the Year of the Male, aiming to challenge the culture that prevents men from seeking help when they need it.
Bu zorlu g\u00f6revi ger\u00e7ekle\u015f: Friendship lies at the heart of the battle to meet this challenge.
2.000'den fazla depresif semptom g\u00f6: A recent study of more than 2,000 high-school students displaying depressive symptoms found that if the sufferer had a high enough percentage of "healthy mood" friends, their chances of recovering doubled.
Ayn\u0131 \u015fekilde, depresif olmayan: Equally, for those not depressed, a circle of mentally healthy friends halved the chances of mental challenges arising.
Ancak elbette arkada\u015fl\u0131\u011f\: But of course, for friendship to work, it needs to be accessible in the first place.
Sosyal medya a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131kl\u01: In this age of social-media led communication, with its focus on style over substance, immediacy of response is often prioritised over meaningful contact.
Dijital hayatlar\u0131m\u0131z, g\u00fc\: Our digital lives have doubled the need to appear strong, fun-loving and successful, even if in reality isolation is king.
Yapay ba\u015far\u0131 psikologlar\u0131: This superficial success is dominated by what psychologists term extrinsic values; money, image, social status, all at the expense of intrinsic values - our inner yearning for personal growth and friendship - that more deeply impacts our mental health.
Milyarder bir video oyunlar\u0131 yarat\: And as a billionaire video-game creator explained recently, money really doesn't buy greater happiness.
Friends dizisinin g\u00fczelli\u011fi bu: The beauty of Friends was that it turned this focus on its head.
Karakterler i\u015fleriyle de\u011fil am: Each of the characters were not defined by their work, but rather their personalities, which shone through the interaction as friends.
Joey ve Chandler'in s\u0131k s\u0131k sa: The humour of Joey and Chandler's frequent hugs, moments watching football on the comfy chairs, and Ross's pining for Rachel, came from the knowledge that yes, men can all relate to this, even if they often hold back from fully exploring their feelings.
Yard\u0131msever bir \u00e7al\u0131\u015: As a Samaritan worker explained to me: ...."my listening role to people feeling depressed and suicidal has really highlighted how even the smallest interactions from friends can make a difference."
Bizimle ileti\u015fime ge\u00e7en erkekl: Often the men who contact us feel unable to speak to friends.
\"Ge\u00e7inip gitmek\" gibi bir duygu \: The old adage of "getting on with it" is strong, as is the sense that it will be perceived as weak to open up about problems."
Uzun vadeli ba\u015fa \u00e7\u0131kma me: Friends is one of the shows that comes to mind when I try and offer more long-term coping mechanisms.
Erkek arkada\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u: It highlighted the little moments of male friendship.
Benim hedefim do\u011frultusunda, telefo: As much as my objective, outsider status over the phone helps people in moments of desperation, the long-term support comes from a close, personal family and friend network.
Ve e\u011fer bu hafta sonu Comedy Centra: And so, if you attend Comedy Central's FriendsFest this weekend, with the sets fully redesigned in celebration, why not take your friends for a drink at Central Perk.
Veya, daha da iyisi, Starbucks'ta yaln\u: Or, better still, if in Starbucks you see someone alone, give a smile and say hello.
Arkada\u015fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131z\: You never know what difference your friendship could make.
Friends, Comedy Central'de ba\u015ftan s: Friends is broadcasting on Comedy Central from start to finish - the full 236 episodes - for #FriendsFest

O tarihten bu yana sadece onunla ayn\u01: Since then we have only played in the Swedish league which is not the same level.

Damon ve Brown g\u00f6sterinin finalistl: Damon and Brown were joined by fellow producers Ben Affleck and the Farrelly brothers to discuss the show's finalists.
Brown \u00f6nce \"\u0130nsanlara - y\u00: "I would urge people to think about -- whoever the director is, how they're going to treat the character of Harmony," Brown initially said.
Tek siyah karakter beyaz bir muhabbet te: The only black character who's a hooker who gets hit by her white pimp.
Sevgili Beyaz \u0130nsanlar'\u0131n yay\: The Dear White People producer pushed for finalists Leo Angelos and Kristen Brancaccio for the rights to direct the film; Damon retorted their directing could "end up giving us something we don't want."
Tart\u0131\u015fma yay\u0131nland\u0131k: After the discussion aired, social media exploded in disapproval over Damon's comments.
Twitter kullan\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 MrPoo: Twitter user MrPooni expressed anger toward the clip writing, "Matt Damon speaking over the only black person in the room so he can explain diversity to her is SO WHITE it hurts."
Tweet g\u00f6nderildikten sonra 5.000 re: The tweet earned more than 5,000 retweets and 4,000 likes since being posted.
Damon'un yorumlar\u0131, medyada do\u011: Damon's comments come at a time where accurate racial representation in media is at the forefront of social discussion.
2014 y\u0131l\u0131nda Michael Brown ad\: After teen Michael Brown was killed by a white police officer in 2014, the Black Lives Matter movement took nationwide effect, urging lawmakers and authorities to halt discriminatory practices against people of color.
\u015eubat ay\u0131nda \u015fark\u0131c\: In February, singer Prince alluded to the movement while introducing the nominees of Album of the Year at the Grammy Awards.
Kitaplar ve siyah ya\u015famlar gibi alb: Like books and black lives, albums still matter.
Yak\u0131n zamanda Siyah Ya\u015fam\u013: More recently, leaders of the Black Lives Matter movement released a statement in response to Fox News personality Elisabeth Hasselbeck's question of whether the group should be considered a hate group.
Liderler, Siyah Ya\u015fam\u0131 \u00d6n: "The Black Lives Matter Network is a love group," leaders said.

Daveti kabul edip etmedi\u011fi ya da Pa: Whether he accepted the invitation or has already met with the Pope is unclear.
Profesyonel kaya t\u0131rman\u0131c\u013: Pro-rock climber and busboy Isaac Caldiero became the first athlete to win American Ninja Warrior Monday night taking home the $1 million grand prize.
7. sezonuna giren bu yar\u0131\u015fma,: The competition show, which just wrapped up its 7th season, has never seen any competitor complete all stages of its obstacle course.
Sezon finalinde, Caldiero ve Geoff Britt: During the season finale, two men, Caldiero and cameraman Geoff Britten, made it to the final round.
Son g\u00f6rev 30 saniyede yakla\u015f\u: The final task involved climbing a 75-foot rope in 30 seconds.
Britten bu parkuru zaman\u0131nda ilk ta: Britten went first completing the challenge on time, making him the first-ever athlete to complete American Ninja Warrior's grueling stage 4, however, Caldiero finished the challenge a full three seconds faster making him the winner.

Yap\u0131mc\u0131 Kent Weed de The Holly: Executive producer Kent Weed sat down with The Hollywood Reporter to discuss the finale and why, despite Britten being the first ever competitor to finish the course, won't be awarded any prize money.
Kurallara g\u00f6re para en h\u0131zl\u0: By the rules, the money goes to the fastest person.
Weed, \"birden fazla bitiren varsa bunu: "If there's more than one finisher, the one with the fastest time gets it," said Weed.
Para harika bir \u00f6d\u00fcl olsa da v: As much as the money is a wonderful prize and life changing, he does get the great gratification.
Bununla ilgili k\u00f6t\u00fc bir d\u00f: I don't think he harbors any ill will about it.
Yapm\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu \u015feyi y: He's just so happy to have done what he's done.
Hayranlar\u0131ndan tonlarca \u00f6vg\u0: He's received tons of accolades from fans.
He's such a great guy, and a family man.
\u00c7ocuklar\u0131 ve e\u015fine g\u00f: He's a hero to his kids and his wife.
Geoff bana, \"e\u011fer beni birisi yene: Geoff said to me, "If I was going to be beat by someone, I'm glad it's Isaac."
Bence rolleri de\u011fi\u015fmi\u015f ol: And I think Isaac would have felt the same way if they roles were reversed.
Amerikan Ninja Sava\u015f\u00e7\u0131s\u: America Ninja Warrior was renewed for an eighth season, which will begin filming in Spring 2016.
